content.en_US:
An important petrochemical product that is obtained by the [[reforming|Reforming]] of [[naphtha|Naphtha]] in the [[catalytic reformer|Catalytic Reformer]]. Mainly produced during the [[vacuum oil processing|Vacuum Oil Processing]] using [[crude oil|Crude Oil]] in the [[vacuum refinery|Vacuum Refinery]].

It is [[fractionated|Fractioning Tower]] into [[BTX|BTX]] and [[aromatic hydrocarbons|Aromatic Hydrocarbons]] or [[cracked|Catalytic Cracking Tower]] into [[unsaturated hydrocarbons|Unsaturated Hydrocarbons]] and [[reformate gas|Reformate Gas]]. It can be used to [[improve|High-Cetane Diesel]] [[diesel|Diesel]] fuels or made into [[jet fuel|Jet Fuel]].
